classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: They fight. A lot. It's a simple life

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: They smell odd but seem to always find me

classes.name: Rouge
classes.description: The sneaky type. Always getting in places they shouldn't. HEY WHERE'S MY WALLET!

classes.name: Fancy
classes.description: Does everything like we do, just fancier.
